content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 and 2,0)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel (27) and iron ore input (3)
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel (27) and iron ore input (3)
Both furnaces are working, producing iron plates (4 each)

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4 and 6,4)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing copper plates:
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) with coal fuel (30) and copper ore input (4)
- Furnace 4 at (6,4) with coal fuel (31) and copper ore input (4)
Both furnaces are working, producing copper plates (4 each)

### Power Generation System (Position -7.5, 18.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (-7.5, 18.5), working status, containing 200 steam at 165°
- Boiler at (-7.5, 22.0), working with 2 coal, containing water (199.99) and steam (199.96)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5), working status, containing water (99.96)
- Connected pipe groups:
  - Steam pipes at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Empty pipes at (-7.5, 20.5)
  - Water pipes at (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles at positions (-9.5,18.5), (-5.5,18.5), (-1.5,18.5), (-10.5,15.5), (3.5,15.5), (1.5,17.5)

### Research Facility
- Lab conducting electronics research
- Connected to the electrical network (ID: 5392)
- Currently processing automation science packs (196 in inventory)
- Working status

ERROR TIPS

### Lab Inventory Management
- Lab has a maximum capacity for science packs
- Check lab's current inventory before attempting to insert more science packs
- Cannot insert more science packs when lab inventory is full (196/1400 items)

### Boiler Fuel Management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to prevent running out of fuel
- Check inventory for coal before attempting to insert into boiler
- Maintain regular coal supply to prevent power generation interruptions

### Research Prerequisites Error
- Check technology prerequisites before starting research
- Automation research must be completed before Electronics research can begin

### Production Management
- Monitor fuel levels in furnaces to maintain continuous production
- Keep track of ore supplies to maintain continuous plate production
- Balance production between iron and copper based on needs

### Item Insertion Errors
- Cannot insert electronic circuits into lab when it's not the correct research ingredient
- Verify the lab accepts the type of item being inserted before attempting insertion

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels and harvest more before completely running out
- Keep track of fuel resources to avoid production interruptions
